+package org.tensorflow.op.annotation;
+
+import java.lang.annotation.Documented;
+import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
+import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
+import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
+import java.lang.annotation.Target;
+
+/**
+ * Annotation used by classes that should be added to the Ops convenience API.
body:
How about:

Annotation used by classes to make TensorFlow operations conveniently accessible via org.tensorflow.ops.Ops

(or wherever this is supposed to make them accessible)
